{{title|operator-{{small|(ranges::adjacent_transform_view::''sentinel'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|
template&lt; bool OtherConst &gt;
    requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;/*inner-sentinel*/&lt;Const&gt;,
                                     /*inner-iterator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&gt;
friend constexpr
    ranges::range_difference_t&lt;/*maybe-const*/&lt;OtherConst, InnerView&gt;&gt;
        operator-( const /*iterator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&amp; x, const /*sentinel*/&amp; y );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|
template&lt; bool OtherConst &gt;
    requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;/*inner-sentinel*/&lt;Const&gt;,
                                     /*inner-iterator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&gt;
friend constexpr
    ranges::range_difference_t&lt;/*maybe-const*/&lt;OtherConst, InnerView&gt;&gt;
        operator-( const /*sentinel*/&amp; y, const /*iterator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&amp; x );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Computes the distance between the {{lt|cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/iterator}} {{c|x}} and the {{rlp|/|sentinel}} {{c|y}}.

@1@ Equivalent to: &lt;!--{{c|1=return x.inner_ - y.inner_;}}--&gt;
{{box|{{c/core|return x.}}{{lti|cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/iterator#Data members|inner_}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|- y.}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}}{{c/core|;}}}}.

@2@ Equivalent to: &lt;!--{{c|1=return y.inner_ - x.inner_;}}--&gt;
{{box|{{c/core|return y.}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|- x.}}{{lti|cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/iterator#Data members|inner_}}{{c/core|;}}}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|adjacent_transform_view::''sentinel''}}|plural=yes|tmpl=yes}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|the iterator}}
{{par|y|the sentinel}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The distance between iterator and sentinel.
